recipe_name: Pork skewer with chargrilled butternut squash
author: Gino D'Acampo
method: For the pork skewer, thread the pork and the yellow pepper pieces onto a skewer and drizzle with oil. Heat a griddle pan and place the skewer into the pan. Drizzle with the soy sauce and honey and chargrill for 4-5 minutes on each side, or until golden-brown and completely cooked through. For the chargrilled butternut squash, heat a griddle pan and place the butternut squash slices into the pan. Brush with oil and cook for 5-6 minutes on each side, or until tender and golden-brown. To serve, place the butternut squash onto a plate, top with the pork skewer and sprinkle over the sesame seeds.
ingredients: 200g/7oz pork tenderloin, cubed ,  1 yellow pepper, chopped,  1 tbsp olive oil,  2 tbsp soy sauce,  1 tbsp clear honey ,  2 large slices butternut squash,  1 tbsp olive oil,  1 tbsp sesame seeds, to garnish
